title: Cronycles of the londe of Englo[n]d
publicationPlace: [Enpre[n]tyd in the Duchye of Braband in the towne of Andewarpe :
publisher: In the yere of owr lord. M.cccc.xciij. By maistir Gerard de leew. a man of grete wysedom in all maner of ku[n]nyng: whych nowe is come from lyfe vnto the deth, which is grete harme for many a poure man,
